# Overview

Map of `Espana Hydrorivers`, distance from the end of the river to the farthest point upstream on the watershed divide - Global river network.
Data is from `HydroRIVERS`.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```


```{r}
rivers <- read_sf("data/HydroRIVERS_v10_eu_shp")
```


```{r}
rivers%>%select(LENGTH_KM)%>%summary()
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
    geom_sf(data=rivers,
          linewidth=0.1,aes(color=DIST_DN_KM),
          show.legend = F)+
  scale_color_gradient(low = "white",high = "black")+
  ggnewscale::new_scale_color()+
      geom_sf(data=rivers,
          linewidth=0.5,aes(color=DIST_UP_KM),
          show.legend = F)+
  scale_color_gradient(low = "white",high = "red")+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(35,45))+
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-10,10))+
  ggthemes::theme_map()
```


```{r}
ggsave("day17_flow.png",bg="grey")
```
